mapper.select:
SELECT p.id productId, p.product_name productName, p.product_img productImg, p.product_des productDes, p.product_detail productDetail, p.product_price productPrice, p.product_price productPrice, p.price_unit priceUnit, p.total_reward totalReward, p.task_price taskPrice, p.success_reward successReward, p.every_reward everyReward, o.id taskOrderId, o.task_id taskId, o.user_id userId, o.task_number taskNumber, o.order_price orderPrice, o.price_type priceType, o.end_time endTime, ifnull(follow.followCnt, 0) followCount, ifnull(f.status, 0) followStatus
FROM s_task_order o LEFT JOIN s_user_task u ON u.id = o.task_id LEFT JOIN s_product p ON p.id = u.product_id LEFT JOIN (select task_order_id, count(*) followCnt from s_user_follow where follow_type = 1 and status = 1 group by task_order_id) follow ON follow.task_order_id = o.id LEFT JOIN s_user_follow f ON f.user_id = #{sTaskOrder.userId} AND f.task_order_id = o.id AND f.follow_type = 1
WHERE o.status = 0 AND o.end_time > now()
AND o.id = #{sTaskOrder.id}
